thread.title: Lauren Goodger flaunts 8lbs weight loss while supporting friend's Essex salon opening - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Lauren Goodger flaunts 8lbs weight loss while supporting friend's Essex salon opening - Mirror Online

author: Lara Martin
title: Lauren Goodger flaunts 8lbs weight loss while supporting friend's Essex salon opening - Mirror Online
text:
Lauren Goodger flaunts 8lbs weight loss while supporting friend's Essex salon opening The Only Way Is Essex star recently attended a boot camp in Hertford Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Lauren Goodger stepped out over the weekend to support her friend’s salon opening, after proudly declaring she’s lost 8lbs in the last four days. 
The TOWIE star dressed to impress in a tiny skirt and over the knee boots while attending the launch of By Georgina Salon in Essex on Saturday night. 
Lauren, 30, smiled for the cameras as she flaunted her slimline figure in the skimpy ensemble, adding a plunging cut t-shirt and cropped leather jacket to finish her look. Lauren looked in high spirits (Photo: FameFlynet) She met up with TOWIE co-star Amber Dowding (Photo: FameFlynet) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Lauren Goodger wants to start a family with jailed boyfriend Share this video Watch Next 
Inside the bash, Lauren met up with The Only Way Is Essex co-star Amber Dowding, who was sporting a very racy blue jumpsuit that left little to the imagination. 
The reality star recently took to Instagram to tell fans she’d lost 8lbs in just four days while attending Carbon Boot Camp in Hertford. 
Alongside a photo of herself in figure-hugging gym gear, Lauren said: “Thank you so much @carbonbootcamp for having me last 5 days! My 8LBs weightloss in 4 days. You've now motivated me to keep going!!!!” https://www.instagram.com/p/BQ08OKMBeO0/embed 
Lauren also told fans she’s finally positive and excited about what 2017 will bring, after focusing her mind on achieving her goals. 
In a motivational Instagram post, she said: “I feel so excited and blessed that my mind is so focused on who and where I want to be ... I'm not going lie it's taken me a while to refocus but that's ok!! I now feel ready and determined! And I believe who is meant to be here will always be!” 
She included a string of hashtags including ‘body’ and ‘fit’. Lauren supported her friend's salon launch (Photo: FameFlynet) The star is looking fab these days (Photo: FameFlynet)
